title: Airsense at Interschutz 2015
text:
Print Email 
This year at the Interschutz in Hanover in June, Airsense presented a brand new exhibition stand and innovative products. 
It was the company's intention to create a pleasant atmosphere with an open stand. Almost the whole sales team, as well as colleagues from the service team, were present at the German exhibition. In order to draw attention to your B-detection products, Airsense's colleague Mr Pagel of 'miprolab' also joined. 
Airsense displayed the GDA-X, the LSID, a PEN, an EDU and AT, as well as information about 'miprolab'. In one week, about 120 interested parties visited the Airsense and 'miprolab' stand. 
Organising the exhibition well in advance ensured a meet-up with many international and national customers, such as Brazilian customers and delegates from Korea and Japan, who the company has kept in contact with for a long time. 
Airsense is especially proud about the introduction of the GDA-P. This project was completed in close collaboration with existing and new customers to create a new-generation of detectors for military use. Even laboratories and the chemical industry are interested in this new detector. Follow Us:
